Class GameStarter

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.networking.GameStarter

  • public class GameStarter
extends java.lang.Object
    GameStarter Class This method initializes all parameters necessaries to create a new match
    Author:
    Luca Massini, Davide Lorenzi (JDocs)
